name: Get_Room_List

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

Supplements are not calculated automatically in the total costs and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cots, extra beds and children allowed in existing beds may vary depending on the option you book.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471721.description:
These sea-facing suites offer views of the Arabian Sea. With a living area, bedroom and a marble-finished bathroom with a tub, these suites also feature a balcony that overlooks the Gateway of India. 

The suites include:
- Access to buffet breakfast at the Sea Lounge
- High-tea at the Palace Lounge from 15:00 to 17:00
- Daily evening cocktail hours at the Palace Lounge from 18:00 to 19:00
- Service of hot and soft beverages at the Palace Lounge from 07:00 to 23:00
- Complimentary one-way airport transfer 
- Ironing for two pieces of garments per stay
- Convenience of early check-in (post 09:00) and late check-out (until 18:00) (subject to availability)
- A two-hour complimentry access to a meeting room at the business center per stay (subject to availability with prior reservation)

children_at_the_property.text: Children of any age are welcome.
Children 12 years and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

7471725.description: Offering free toiletries and bathrobes, this triple room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as city views. The unit offers 1 bed.

The air-conditioned triple room offers a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker, a safe deposit box as well as sea views. The unit offers 1 bed.

response_summary:
The API response provides detailed information about hotel room options available for booking in Mumbai, with check-in on June 10, 2025, and check-out on June 15, 2025. Here's a summary of the key details:

### Room Options:
1. **Superior Room Sea View King Bed (Single Occupancy)**
   - **Price**: Approximately **$765** (₹65,450) for the stay, including breakfast. Additional taxes and charges amount to **$138**.
   - **Cancellation Policy**: Free cancellation until **June 8, 2025**. After that, the first night's cost will be charged if canceled.
   - **Prepayment**: A partial prepayment of the first night's cost is required two days before arrival.
   - **Meal Plan**: Breakfast is included. Lunch and dinner are available for **$58** each.
   - **Room Size**: 26 m² (279 ft²).
   - **Highlights**: Free WiFi, air conditioning, ensuite bathroom, and sea views.

2. **Deluxe Room Sea View King Bed (Single Occupancy)**
   - **Price**: Approximately **$865** (₹73,950) for the stay, including breakfast. Additional taxes and charges amount to **$156**.
   - **Cancellation Policy**: Free cancellation until **June 8, 2025**.
   - **Prepayment**: Partial prepayment required two days before arrival.
   - **Meal Plan**: Breakfast included. Lunch and dinner available for **$58** each.
   - **Room Size**: 26 m² (279 ft²).
   - **Highlights**: Free WiFi, air conditioning, ensuite bathroom, and sea views.

3. **Other Options**: 
   - Half-board and full-board meal plans are available for some rooms, with full board costing an additional **$58** per day.
   - All rooms feature amenities like bathrobes, safety deposit boxes, and air conditioning.

### General Policies:
- **Cancellation**: Free cancellation is available for most rooms until **June 8, 2025**. After this date, cancellation fees apply.
- **Prepayment**: A prepayment of the first night's cost is required two days before arrival.
- **Children**: Children of any age are welcome. Those aged 12 and above are charged as adults. Extra beds are available for children aged 3 and above at **$35.08** per night.
- **Payment**: Credit card details are required for booking, and the CVC code is mandatory.

### Property Highlights:
- **Top Benefits**: Free WiFi, airport shuttle service, and a swimming pool.
- **Average Room Size**: Approximately 14.07 m².

### Additional Notes:
- Prices are displayed in USD but are converted from INR, so actual charges may vary slightly.
- Supplements (like extra beds or meals) are not automatically included in the total cost and must be paid separately during the stay.

This summary provides a clear overview of the available accommodations, pricing, and policies for a hassle-free booking experience.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning hotel stays and comparing room options. It retrieves detailed room listings for a specific hotel, including pricing, amenities, cancellation policies, and meal plans. Users can filter results by check-in/check-out dates, guest count (adults/children), and room quantity. The response provides comprehensive booking details like taxes, prepayment rules, and property highlights to facilitate informed decisions. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Check-in date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Check-out date for the hotel stay.
enhanced_parameters.adults: Number of adult guests (18+ years). Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.room_qty: Number of rooms required. Default is 1.
enhanced_parameters.location: Geographic location code for the hotel.

policies.description: A list of policies related to the hotel booking.

ar_items.description: An object representing a specific policy.

content.description: The detailed description of the policy (e.g., cancellation terms).

class.description: The classification or type of the policy (e.g., 'POLICY_CANCELLATION').

refund_during_fc.description: Details about the refund policy during the free cancellation period.

title_details.description: Title details for the refund policy during free cancellation.

translation.description: The translated text indicating the refund policy (e.g., 'Fully refundable during free cancellation').

tag.description: A tag identifying the type of clarification (e.g., 'clarification_full_refund_during_free_cancellation').

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., 'Fully refundable during free cancellation').

prepayment.description: Details about the prepayment policy for the booking.

description_details.description: Description details for the prepayment policy.

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., 'You will be charged a prepayment of the cost of the first night in the 2 days before arrival.').

translation.description: The translated text describing the prepayment policy.

title_details.description: Title details for the prepayment policy.

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., 'Pay the property before arrival').

tag.description: A tag identifying the type of payment policy (e.g., 'payment_pay_to_property_before_arrival_name').

translation.description: The translated text for the prepayment title (e.g., 'Pay the property before arrival').

policy_type_key.description: A key identifying the policy type (e.g., 'patp_with_prepayment').

cancellation.description: Details about the cancellation policy for the booking.

policy_type_key.description: A key identifying the cancellation policy type (e.g., 'free_cancellation').

clarification_details.description: Clarification details about the cancellation policy.

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., '(Cancellation deadlines are in the property's timezone – {timezone})').

parameters.description: Parameters for the cancellation deadline (e.g., timezone and date).

tag.description: A tag identifying the type of clarification (e.g., 'clarification_cancellation_deadline_in_property_timezone').

translation.description: The translated text for the cancellation clarification (e.g., '(Cancellation deadlines are in the property's timezone – Asia/Kolkata)').

parameters.description: Additional parameters for the cancellation policy.

has_cancellation_fee.description: Indicates if there is a cancellation fee (0 for no fee).

title_details.description: Title details for the cancellation policy.

translation.description: The translated text for the cancellation title (e.g., 'Free cancellation before 8 June 2025').

parameters.description: Parameters for the cancellation title (e.g., timezone, date, and free cancellation deadline).

free_cancellation_deadline.description: The exact deadline for free cancellation (e.g., '2025-06-08T00:00:00+05:30').

tag.description: A tag identifying the type of cancellation policy (e.g., 'cxl_fc_before_short_date_with_year_name').

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., 'Free cancellation before {date}').

has_html.description: Indicates if the translation contains HTML (1 for yes).

description_details.description: Description details for the cancellation policy.

translation.description: The translated text describing the cancellation policy (e.g., 'You may cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival...').

placeholder_translation.description: Placeholder text for translation (e.g., 'You may cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival...').

applied_products.description: Indicates if any additional products are applied to the booking (null if none).

policies.description: A list of policies related to the booking, such as cancellation and prepayment policies.

ar_items.description: An object representing a specific policy.

key.description: A unique identifier for the policy (e.g., 'FreeCancellationKey').

text.description: A formatted text description of the policy, which may include placeholders for dynamic values (e.g., 'Free cancellation before {date}').

parameters.description: A list of parameters used to populate dynamic values in the policy text.

ar_items.description: An object representing a parameter for dynamic text substitution.

key.description: The placeholder key in the policy text (e.g., 'date').

type.description: The data type of the parameter (e.g., 'datetime').

format.description: The format in which the parameter value should be displayed (e.g., 'dMMMy').

value.description: The actual value of the parameter (e.g., '2025-06-08T00:00:00+05:30').

policy_type_key.description: A key identifying the type of policy (e.g., 'free_cancellation').

description.description: A detailed description of the policy (e.g., cancellation terms).

icon.description: An icon identifier associated with the policy (e.g., 'checkmark_fill').

footer.description: Additional footer text for the policy, which may include placeholders (e.g., '(Cancellation deadlines are in the property's timezone – {timezone})').

applied_products.description: Indicates that no products are currently applied to the booking.

booking_conditions.description: A list of conditions that apply to the booking, such as prepayment requirements.

ar_items.description: An object representing a specific booking condition.

icon.description: An icon identifier associated with the condition (e.g., 'credit_card').

text.description: A brief description of the condition (e.g., 'Prepayment').

key.description: A unique identifier for the condition (e.g., 'WithPrepaymentKey').

policy_type_key.description: A key identifying the type of policy associated with the condition (e.g., 'patp_with_prepayment').

description.description: A detailed description of the condition (e.g., prepayment terms).

cancellation.description: Details about the cancellation policy for the hotel booking.

info.description: Detailed information about the cancellation policy.

is_midnight.description: Indicates if the cancellation deadline is at midnight (1 for true, 0 for false).

refundable_date.description: The date and time until which cancellation is free, formatted as YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+hh:mm.

timezone_offset.description: The timezone offset in seconds from UTC.

date_before.description: The human-readable date before which cancellation is free (e.g., '7 June 2025').

date_before_raw.description: The raw date before which cancellation is free, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

date_raw.description: The raw date and time of the cancellation deadline, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

refundable.description: Indicates if the booking is refundable (1 for true, 0 for false).

date.description: The human-readable date of the cancellation deadline (e.g., '8 June 2025').

refundable_date_midnight.description: The date and time until which cancellation is free, adjusted to midnight, formatted as YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+hh:mm.

timezone.description: The timezone of the cancellation deadline (e.g., 'IST').

time.description: The time of the cancellation deadline (e.g., '00:00').

guaranteed_non_refundable.description: Indicates if the booking is guaranteed non-refundable (1 for true, 0 for false).

timeline.description: Timeline details for the cancellation policy.

nr_stages.description: The number of stages in the cancellation timeline.

stages.description: List of stages in the cancellation timeline.

ar_items.description: Details of a cancellation stage.

text.description: Human-readable description of the cancellation stage (e.g., 'Free cancellation until 23:59 on 7 Jun').

text_refundable.description: Refund details for the stage (e.g., 'You'll get a full refund if you cancel before 23:59 on 7 June 2025.').

fee_remaining_pretty.description: Formatted remaining fee in property currency (e.g., 'INR 65450').

limit_until_raw.description: Raw deadline for the stage, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

limit_until.description: Human-readable deadline for the stage (e.g., '7 June 2025 23:59').

limit_until_date.description: Human-readable date of the deadline (e.g., '7 June 2025').

current_stage.description: Indicates if this is the current stage (1 for true, 0 for false).

limit_from_raw.description: Raw start date for the stage, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

u_stage_fee_pretty.description: Formatted stage fee in user's currency (e.g., 'US$ 0').

limit_from.description: Human-readable start date for the stage (e.g., '19 May 2025 12:39').

is_effective.description: Indicates if the stage is currently effective (1 for true, 0 for false).

is_free.description: Indicates if the stage is free (1 for true, 0 for false).

u_fee_remaining_pretty.description: Formatted remaining fee in user's currency (e.g., 'US$ 765').

stage_fee_pretty.description: Formatted stage fee in property currency (e.g., 'INR 0').

date_until.description: Full deadline date and time with timezone (e.g., '2025-06-07 23:59:59 +0530').

description.description: Detailed description of the cancellation policy.

non_refundable_anymore.description: Indicates if the booking is non-refundable (1 for true, 0 for false).

type_translation.description: Translated type of cancellation policy (e.g., 'Free cancellation').

prepayment.description: Details about the prepayment policy for the hotel booking.

info.description: Detailed information about the prepayment policy.

time.description: The time of the prepayment deadline (e.g., '00:00').

timezone.description: The timezone of the prepayment deadline (e.g., 'IST').

date.description: The human-readable date of the prepayment deadline (e.g., '8 June 2025').

timezone_offset.description: The timezone offset in seconds from UTC.

date_before.description: The human-readable date before which prepayment is required (e.g., '7 June 2025').

is_midnight.description: Indicates if the prepayment deadline is at midnight (1 for true, 0 for false).

prepayment_at_booktime.description: Indicates if prepayment is required at booking time (1 for true, 0 for false).

refundable.description: Indicates if the prepayment is refundable (1 for true, 0 for false).

simple_translation.description: Simple translated description of the prepayment policy (e.g., 'Prepayment').

description.description: Detailed description of the prepayment policy.

timeline.description: Timeline details for the prepayment policy.

nr_stages.description: The number of stages in the prepayment timeline.

stages.description: List of stages in the prepayment timeline.

ar_items.description: Details of a prepayment stage.

limit_from_date.description: Human-readable start date for the stage (e.g., '19 May 2025').

u_fee_remaining_pretty.description: Formatted remaining fee in user's currency (e.g., 'US$ 765').

is_free.description: Indicates if the stage is free (1 for true, 0 for false).

stage_fee_pretty.description: Formatted stage fee in property currency (e.g., 'INR 0').

limit_until.description: Human-readable deadline for the stage (e.g., '7 June 2025 23:59').

limit_until_raw.description: Raw deadline for the stage, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

limit_until_date.description: Human-readable date of the deadline (e.g., '7 June 2025').

text.description: Human-readable description of the prepayment stage (e.g., 'Today you'll pay').

fee_remaining_pretty.description: Formatted remaining fee in property currency (e.g., 'INR 65450').

limit_from.description: Human-readable start date for the stage (e.g., '19 May 2025 12:39').

u_stage_fee_pretty.description: Formatted stage fee in user's currency (e.g., 'US$ 0').

is_effective.description: Indicates if the stage is currently effective (1 for true, 0 for false).

limit_from_raw.description: Raw start date for the stage, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

current_stage.description: Indicates if this is the current stage (1 for true, 0 for false).

type_translation.description: Translated type of prepayment policy (e.g., 'Prepayment needed').

extended_type_translation.description: Extended translated type of prepayment policy (e.g., 'REFUNDABLE prepayment needed').

text.description: The formatted text describing the cancellation policy, including HTML tags for styling (e.g., 'Free cancellation before {date}').

key.description: A unique identifier for the cancellation policy (e.g., 'FreeCancellationKey').

icon.description: The name or identifier of the icon associated with the cancellation policy (e.g., 'checkmark_fill').

parameters.description: A list of parameters used to dynamically populate the cancellation policy text.

ar_items.description: An object representing a parameter used in the cancellation policy text.

type.description: The data type of the parameter (e.g., 'datetime').

format.description: The format in which the parameter value should be displayed (e.g., 'dMMMy').

key.description: The key used to identify the parameter in the text (e.g., 'date').

included_taxes_and_charges_amount.description: Details about the included taxes and charges, showing the amount in both unrounded and rounded forms along with the currency.

amount_unrounded.description: The unrounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

value.description: The numerical value of the included taxes and charges (e.g., 0).

amount_rounded.description: The rounded amount of included taxes and charges (e.g., 'US$0').

currency.description: The currency code for the included taxes and charges (e.g., 'USD').

charges_details.description: Details about additional charges, including the translated copy and the amount.

translated_copy.description: A human-readable description of the additional charges (e.g., '+US$137.75 taxes and charges').

amount.description: The amount of the additional charge, including currency and value.

currency.description: The currency code for the charge (e.g., 'USD').

value.description: The numerical value of the charge (e.g., 138).

gross_amount_hotel_currency.description: The total gross amount in the hotel's local currency, including unrounded and rounded values.

amount_unrounded.description: The unrounded gross amount in the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'Rs. 65,450').

value.description: The numerical value of the gross amount (e.g., 65450).

amount_rounded.description: The rounded gross amount in the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'Rs. 65,450').

currency.description: The currency code for the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'INR').

net_amount.description: The net amount after deductions, including unrounded and rounded values.

currency.description: The currency code for the net amount (e.g., 'USD').

value.description: The numerical value of the net amount (e.g., 765.295522413235).

gross_amount_per_night.description: The gross amount per night, including unrounded and rounded values.

value.description: The numerical value of the gross amount per night (e.g., 153.059104482647).

amount_rounded.description: The rounded gross amount per night (e.g., 'US$153').

currency.description: The currency code for the gross amount per night (e.g., 'USD').

amount_unrounded.description: The unrounded gross amount per night (e.g., 'US$153.06').

has_long_stays_monthly_rate_price.description: Indicates whether the room has a long-stay monthly rate price (0 for no, 1 for yes).

has_long_stays_weekly_rate_price.description: Indicates whether the room has a long-stay weekly rate price (0 for no, 1 for yes).

ar_items.description: An object representing a price display configuration setting.

gross_amount.description: The total gross amount, including unrounded and rounded values.

value.description: The numerical value of the gross amount (e.g., 765.295522413235).

currency.description: The currency code for the gross amount (e.g., 'USD').

benefits.description: A list of benefits associated with the room (empty in this example).

excluded_amount.description: The amount excluded from the total price, including unrounded and rounded values.

value.description: The numerical value of the excluded amount (e.g., 137.753199880796).

currency.description: The currency code for the excluded amount (e.g., 'USD').

all_inclusive_amount_hotel_currency.description: The all-inclusive amount in the hotel's local currency, including unrounded and rounded values.

amount_unrounded.description: The unrounded all-inclusive amount in the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'Rs. 77,231').

currency.description: The currency code for the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'INR').

amount_rounded.description: The rounded all-inclusive amount in the hotel's local currency (e.g., 'Rs. 77,231').

value.description: The numerical value of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 77231.0004681349).

all_inclusive_amount.description: The all-inclusive amount, including unrounded and rounded values.

value.description: The numerical value of the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 903.048721921437).

currency.description: The currency code for the all-inclusive amount (e.g., 'USD').

items.description: A list of items included or excluded in the pricing.

ar_items.description: An object representing an item in the pricing breakdown.

base.description: Base details of the item, including the base amount and kind.

base_amount.description: The base amount of the item (e.g., 0).

details.description: Additional details about the item (null in this example).

name.description: The name of the item (e.g., 'Goods & services tax').

item_amount.description: The amount associated with the item, including unrounded and rounded values.

value.description: The numerical value of the item amount (e.g., 137.753199880796).

currency.description: The currency code for the item amount (e.g., 'USD').

nr_adults.description: The number of adults included in the booking.

children_ages.description: An array containing the ages of any children included in the booking. Empty if no children are included.
An array containing the ages of children staying in the room. Empty if no children are included.

extrabed_available_amount.description: Indicates the number of extra beds available. Null if no extra beds are available.

name.description: The full name of the room including occupancy and cancellation policy (e.g., 'Superior Room Sea View King Bed - single occupancy - Free cancellation').

is_smart_deal.description: Indicates whether the room is a smart deal (0 = no, 1 = yes).

room_surface_in_feet2.description: The size of the room in square feet (e.g., 279.8616704).

must_reserve_free_parking.description: Indicates whether free parking must be reserved (0 = no, 1 = yes).

number_of_bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the room (0 indicates a single room).

all_inclusive.description: Indicates whether the room rate is all-inclusive (0 = no, 1 = yes).

smoking.description: Indicates the smoking policy for the room (2 = non-smoking).

deposit_required.description: Indicates whether a deposit is required (0 = no, 1 = yes).

babycots_available_amount.description: Indicates the number of baby cots available. Null if no baby cots are available.

can_reserve_free_parking.description: Indicates whether free parking can be reserved (0 = no, 1 = yes).

is_genius_deal.description: Indicates whether the room is a Genius deal. Null if not applicable.

bh_room_highlights.description: An array of highlights or features of the room. Empty if no highlights are specified.

name_without_policy.description: The name of the room without the cancellation policy (e.g., 'Superior Room Sea View King Bed - single occupancy').

room_name.description: The base name of the room (e.g., 'Superior Room Sea View King Bed').

roomtype_id.description: The unique identifier for the room type (e.g., 7).

is_mobile_deal.description: Indicates whether the room is a mobile deal (0 = no, 1 = yes).

nr_children.description: The number of children staying in the room (0 if no children).

is_last_minute_deal.description: Indicates whether the room is a last-minute deal (0 = no, 1 = yes).

fit_status.description: Indicates the room's fitness status (2 = standard).

number_of_bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms in the room (0 indicates a single bathroom).

package_id.description: The package identifier for the room (0 if no package).

is_domestic_rate.description: Indicates whether the rate is domestic (0 = no, 1 = yes).

extrabed_available.description: Indicates whether extra beds are available (0 = no, 1 = yes).

is_dormitory.description: Indicates whether the room is a dormitory (0 = no, 1 = yes).

b_bsb_campaigns.description: An array of campaigns or promotions applicable to the room. Empty if none.

pod_ios_migrate_policies_to_smp_fullon.description: A technical flag for policy migration (0 = no, 1 = yes).

full_board.description: Indicates whether full board is included (0 = no, 1 = yes).

genius_discount_percentage.description: The discount percentage for Genius members (0 if no discount).

refundable.description: Indicates whether the booking is refundable (0 = no, 1 = yes).

is_block_fit.description: Indicates whether the room is part of a block fit (0 = no, 1 = yes).

is_flash_deal.description: Indicates whether the room is a flash deal (0 = no, 1 = yes).

max_occupancy.description: The maximum number of occupants allowed in the room (e.g., 1).

block_id.description: The unique identifier for the room block (e.g., '7471708_158036154_1_41_0').

half_board.description: Indicates whether half board is included (0 = no, 1 = yes).

total_blocks.description: The total number of room blocks available for booking.

is_exclusive.description: Indicates whether the property is exclusive (null = Not specified).

arrival_date.description: The check-in date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

tax_exceptions.description: A list of tax exceptions applicable to the booking (empty in this case).

duplicate_rates_removed.description: Indicates whether duplicate rates have been removed (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

soldout_rooms.description: A list of sold-out room types (empty in this case).

is_cpv2_property.description: A flag indicating whether the property is part of CPV2 (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

cc_required.description: Indicates whether a credit card is required for booking (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

address_required.description: Indicates whether the guest's address is required for booking (0 = No, 1 = Yes).

recommended_block_title.description: The title for the recommended room block (e.g., 'Recommended for 1 adult').

last_matching_block_index.description: The index of the last matching room block (-1 indicates no match).

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Indicates whether the property is TPI exclusive (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
